diff_hunk:
@@ -260,6 +260,9 @@ def _test_math(self, torchfn, mathfn, input=None):
             input = []
             input.append(list(range(-5, 5)))
             input.append([x + 1e-6 for x in range(-5, 5)])
+            # Some vectorized implementations don't support large ranges
+            input.append([x + 1e10 for x in range(-5, 5)])
+            input.append([x - 1e10 for x in range(-5, 5)])
body: Oh ok. I thought SLEEF has those guarantees only when `abs(x) < 1e10`, so this wouldn't be the case, but maybe I misunderstood something.
body_html: Oh ok. I thought SLEEF has those guarantees only when abs(x) < 1e10, so this wouldn't be the case, but maybe I misunderstood something.
